promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young special frilled-lizard water-type pokemon with sapphire scales. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sapphilisk, a a young special frilled-lizard water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Stream Pump. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "water" or "Sapphilisk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This vibrant, seafaring reptile thrives in aquatic realms. Sapphilisk elegantly navigates currents while using Stream Pump to propel and play.
